trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base que pode ser utilizada para estruturar editores de valor que podem fornecer uma interface de utilizador (IU) para que representa e editar os valores dos objetos dos tipos de dados suportada.

trans-unit.source: The UITypeEditor class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: A classe de UITypeEditor fornece uma classe base que pode derivar e expandir para implementar um editor de tipo personalizado para o ambiente de tempo de criação.

trans-unit.source: Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o seu editor de tipo personalizado interage com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types.
trans-unit.target: Editores de tipo personalizado são úteis em situações em que um editor de valor de caixa de texto é insuficiente para selecionar eficazmente os valores de determinados tipos.

trans-unit.source: To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps: - Define a class that derives from UITypeEditor.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar um editor de tipos de IU personalizado do momento da conceção, tem de efetuar os passos seguintes:-definir uma classe que deriva de UITypeEditor.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment.
trans-unit.target: -Substituir o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>método para a interface de utilizador, o processamento de entrada do utilizador e a atribuição de valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: -Substituir o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método para o informar sobre a janela de propriedades do tipo de estilo de editor que irá utilizar o editor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A> method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar suporte adicional para desenhar a representação de um valor na janela de propriedades, efetuando os passos seguintes:-substituir o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A>método para indicar que o editor de suporta a representação do valor de apresentação.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A> method to implement the display of the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: -Substituir o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A>método para implementar a apresentação de representação do valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the UITypeEditor constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: -Substitua o método do construtor de UITypeEditor se o editor de deve ter o comportamento de inicialização.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The UITypeEditor class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UITypeEditor a classe não suporta esquemas de (RTL) para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre melhorando o tempo de criação de suporte, consulte [expandir o momento da conceção suporta](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on implementing a UITypeEditor, see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre como implementar um UITypeEditor, consulte [descrição geral do editores de tipo de Interface do utilizador](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
trans-unit.target: As edições que o valor do objeto especificado utilizando o editor de estilo indicado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of.
trans-unit.target: Este método inicia a interface de utilizador para a edição de valor e é chamado pela janela Propriedades quando tenta editar o valor de um tipo que deste editor está configurado para editar o valor de um utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviços é fornecido para que o editor pode obter todos os serviços necessários.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que deste editor pode utilizar para obter serviços.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para editar.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object's value using the editor style indicated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
trans-unit.target: Edições de valor, o objeto especificado utilizando o editor de estilo indicado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviços é fornecido para que o editor pode obter todos os serviços necessários.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que podem ser utilizados para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que deste editor pode utilizar para obter serviços.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para editar.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor do objeto não foi alterada, isto deverá devolver o mesmo objeto que foi passado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de editor utilizado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> does not override and implement this method, GetEditStyle will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> by default.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>não substituir e implemente este método, irá devolver GetEditStyle <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>por predefinição.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the style of editor used by the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor de enumeração que indica o estilo do editor utilizado pelo atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method will return <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, este método irá devolver <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de editor utilizado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que podem ser utilizados para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method. If the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> does not support this method, then <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> will return <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o estilo do editor utilizado pelo <> </> *> método. Se o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> não suporta este método, em seguida, <> </> *> irá devolver <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: Indica se este editor suporta desenhar uma representação do valor de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>é implementado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified context supports painting a representation of an object's value within the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o contexto especificado suporta desenhar uma representação do valor de um objeto dentro do contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que podem ser utilizados para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>é implementado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether drop-down editors should be resizable by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os editores de lista pendente devem ser redimensionáveis pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drop-down editors are resizable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se editores de lista pendente são redimensionáveis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma representação do valor de um objeto utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Editores devem pintura dentro dos limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: Neste retângulo indica a área da janela Propriedades para desenhar uma representação do valor dentro do.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], o retângulo especificado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>irá ser redimensionada com base na definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref> that indicates what to paint and where to paint it.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"> </xref> que indica que a pintura e onde de pintura-lo.

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of the specified object to the specified canvas.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma representação do valor do objeto especificado para a tela especificado.

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Editores devem pintura dentro dos limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: Neste retângulo indica a área da janela Propriedades para desenhar uma representação do valor dentro do.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], o retângulo especificado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>irá ser redimensionada com base na definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object whose value this type editor will display.
trans-unit.target: O objecto cujo valor irá apresentar o editor de tipos.

trans-unit.source: A drawing canvas on which to paint the representation of the object's value.
trans-unit.target: Uma tela desenho no qual a representação do valor do objeto de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within whose boundaries to paint the value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> dentro cujos limites para o valor de pintura.
